source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000010_YOTSUYU<tab>Open wide, now...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000010_YOTSUYU<tab>Allez, ouvre grand la bouche.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000020_GOSETSU<tab>Please, Tsuyu. I am not so frail that I cannot feed myself.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000020_GOSETSU<tab>Ça suffit, Tsuyu<var 1D /var>! Je suis par<var 16 /var>fai<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment capable de manger tout seul.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000030_GOSETSU<tab>Ah, I grow weary of the taste of gruel...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000030_GOSETSU<tab>À force d'avaler ce riz bouilli insipide du matin au soir, je vais finir par perdre goût à la vie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000040_YOTSUYU<tab>You don't like it? Can I fetch you something else?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000040_YOTSUYU<tab>Tu n'aimes pas ça<var 1D /var>? Qu'est-ce que tu voudrais manger, alors<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000050_GOSETSU<tab>Aye. Wine! Or if that is not “wholesome” enough─I don't know...a sweet persimmon from Namai? I enjoyed them in my youth.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000050_GOSETSU<tab>Hmm... Ce sera bientôt la saison des kakis à Namai. Leur saveur sucrée me manque, j'en dévorerais bien un.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000060_YOTSUYU<tab>A persimmon.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000060_YOTSUYU<tab>Des kakis...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000070_GOSETSU<tab>Nay, pay me no mind─I am full. Besides, we have guests.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000070_GOSETSU<tab>Je n'ai plus faim. Tu peux débarrasser, Tsuyu.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000080_ALISAIE<tab>I hope we are not interrupting your meal. We had heard you were confined to bed, and thought you might welcome some visitors.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000080_ALISAIE<tab>Quand nous avons appris que vous étiez convalescent, nous avons pensé qu'une petite visite vous ferait plaisir, mais j'ai l'impression que nous dérangeons en fin de compte...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000090_GOSETSU<tab>Confined to─ A gross exaggeration!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000090_GOSETSU<tab>Euh, mais pas du tout<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000100_GOSETSU<tab>A trifle drained from my exertions, perhaps. But with a little rest, I shall be fighting fit again in no time!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000100_GOSETSU<tab>Ne vous inquiétez pas, ce n'est qu'un coup de fatigue passager. J'aurai recouvré mes forces bien assez tôt<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000110_YOTSUYU<tab>Take off your clothes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000110_YOTSUYU<tab>Retire tes vêtements.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000120_ALISAIE<tab>Gosetsu! Is this how you've been spending your time!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000120_ALISAIE<tab>Non mais, Gosetsu<var 1D /var>! Puis-je savoir à quel jeu vous jouez avec Yotsuyu<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000130_GOSETSU<tab>My lady, I assure you, this is not─
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000130_GOSETSU<tab>Ce n'est pas ce que vous croyez<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000140_YOTSUYU<tab>Off with them. We need to wash you─you stink!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000140_YOTSUYU<tab>Vite. Si je n'essuie pas la sueur, tu vas encore sentir le putois<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000150_ALPHINAUD<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000150_ALPHINAUD<tab>Pfff...<var 1D /var>! Ah ah<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000160_YOTSUYU<tab>What are all these scars? There are so many of them...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000160_YOTSUYU<tab>Dis, pourquoi tu as des cicatrices partout<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000170_GOSETSU<tab>A life of battle will leave its mark upon a man...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000170_GOSETSU<tab>... J'ai passé toute ma vie à me battre. Et souvent, quand on se bat, on se blesse.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000180_GOSETSU<tab>Is something wrong, Tsuyu?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000180_GOSETSU<tab>Tsuyu<var 1D /var>? Ça ne va pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000190_YOTSUYU<tab>It's nothing. I'm fine.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000190_YOTSUYU<tab>Hum<var 1D /var>? Si, si... Ça va...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000200_GOSETSU<tab>Bah, leave me be, woman! I will not be fussed over like some newborn babe!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000200_GOSETSU<tab>Bon, arrête ça, Tsuyu. Je ne suis pas un vieillard, je peux encore faire ma toilette moi-même<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000210_ALPHINAUD<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000210_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ah ah ah ah<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000220_ALISAIE<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000220_ALISAIE<tab>Ah ah ah ah<var 1D /var>!

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000230_YOTSUYUGreetings. Might I have one of y─ Wait! Please!
...I only wanted a persimmon.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000230_YOTSUYU<tab>Euh... Je voudrais un kaki, s'il vous plaît... Hé<var 1D /var>! Mais attendez<var 1D /var>! Pourquoi vous partez<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000240_E3F2VILLAGERE<tab>Kami save us! Her spirit has returned!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000240_E3F2VILLAGERE<tab>Oh non, pas elle<var 1D /var>! Son fantôme est revenu nous hanter<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000250_E3F2VILLAGERF<tab>She's back from the dead to seek her revenge!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000250_E3F2VILLAGERF<tab>Elle est là pour se venger de nous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000260_ISSE<tab>It can't be! She couldn't have survived!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000260_ISSE<tab>Yotsuyu<var 1D /var>!? Elle est encore en vie<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000270_YOTSUYU<tab>What did I... Wh-What did I do?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000270_YOTSUYU<tab>J'ai... J'ai fait quelque chose de mal...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000280_ISSE<tab>As if you don't know!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000280_ISSE<tab>Quelque chose de mal<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000290_HIEN<tab>Good people of Namai─be at ease, I pray you! You have naught to fear!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000290_HIEN<tab>Reprenez votre calme, s'il vous plaît<var 1D /var>! Je vais tout vous expliquer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000300_ISSE<tab>My lord, forgive me but─what is that monster doing here!? They told us she was dead!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000300_ISSE<tab>Seigneur Hien, que fait cette femme ici<var 1D /var>!? Tout le monde pensait qu'elle avait péri pendant l'attaque du château<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000310_HIEN<tab>I too was surprised to learn of her survival.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000310_HIEN<tab>Je comprends votre réaction, j'en étais persuadé aussi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000320_HIEN<tab>More even than you, I would hazard. 'Twas I who cut her down. I who left her to her fate.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000320_HIEN<tab>Vous savez pro<var 16 /var>ba<var 16 /var>ble<var 16 /var>ment tous que j'ai abattu Yotsuyu d'un coup de sabre lorsque nous l'avons trouvée en haut du donjon.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000330_HIEN<tab>But it would seem the kami had other plans. By some miracle, both she and Gosetsu were spared when the keep collapsed─though Yotsuyu's preservation came at the cost of her memory.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000330_HIEN<tab>Bien que le toit se soit effondré sur elle et Gosetsu, ils ont tous deux miraculeusement survécu. Non sans séquelles, toutefois, car Yotsuyu a depuis perdu la mémoire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000340_ISSE<tab>You're saying she's <var 1A 02 /var>forgotten<var 1A 01 /var>? Forgotten everything she's done!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000340_ISSE<tab>Vous voulez dire qu'après toutes les atrocités qu'elle nous a fait subir... elle ne se souvient de rien<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000350_E3F2VILLAGERF<tab>Lies! Lies, my lord! She would say anything to escape punishment!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000350_E3F2VILLAGERF<tab>Vous faites pas avoir, Seigneur Hien<var 1D /var>! Elle fait semblant d'être amnésique pour gagner votre pardon<var 1D /var>! C'est évident<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000360_E3F2VILLAGERE<tab>What does it matter!? <var 1A 02 /var>We<var 1A 01 /var> have not forgotten her crimes! And we demand justice! I beg of you, Lord Hien, draw your blade and rid us of this canker!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000360_E3F2VILLAGERE<tab>Que ce démon mente ou pas, ça change rien à tout le mal qu'elle a fait<var 1D /var>! Je vous en prie, Mon Seigneur<var 1D /var>! Vous devez l'exécuter<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000370_YOTSUYU<tab>What I saw, then. It's all true.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000370_YOTSUYU<tab>J'ai... J'ai été méchante<var 1D /var>? C'est ça...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000380_YOTSUYU<tab>I'm sorry! I'm so, so sorry...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000380_YOTSUYU<tab>Pardon... (snif)... Pardon, pardon<var 1D /var>! Je... je suis désolée<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000390_ISSE<tab>You're “sorry”!? And what, we're supposed to forgive you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000390_ISSE<tab>“Pardon”<var 1D /var>?<var 1D /var>... Tu crois vraiment t'en sortir aussi facilement<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000400_AZAMI<tab>Here, there's no need to cry.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000400_AZAMI<tab>Ne pleure plus, ça va aller.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000410_AZAMI<tab>Can't you see how scared she is? How can you be scared of her? She's not the same.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000410_AZAMI<tab>La pauvre... Vous lui faites peur. Regardez-la, elle n'est plus une menace pour personne.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000420_HIEN<tab>Until such time as her memories return, this woman shall be known as “Tsuyu,” and treated as a citizen of Doma.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000420_HIEN<tab>Tant qu'elle n'aura pas recouvré la mémoire, j'ai l'intention de traiter Yotsuyu... ou plutôt Tsuyu comme n'importe quelle victime domienne.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000430_HIEN<tab>I will, however, see that she is watched at all times. Rest assured that there will be no more unannounced visits to the village. As your lord, I ask that you leave her fate in my hands, and suffer her to live. For now.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000430_HIEN<tab>Je vous assure que nous la garderons sous bonne sur<var 16 /var>veil<var 16 /var>lan<var 16 /var>ce, et qu'elle ne viendra plus vous importuner.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000440_AZAMI<tab>Please, Isse...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000440_AZAMI<tab>Ça te va, Isse<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000450_ISSE<tab>All right. I'll keep my peace.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000450_ISSE<tab>Si tu penses que c'est la bonne solution, ça me convient aussi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000460_ISSE<tab>As long as you're happy. That's all that matters.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000460_ISSE<tab>Tout ce qui compte à mes yeux, c'est que tu n'aies plus à vivre dans la peur.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000470_ASAHI<tab>What a pleasure it is to see you once more, Lord Hien. Not to mention my dear sister.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000470_ASAHI<tab>Seigneur Hien. Yotsuyu... Je suis heureux de vous revoir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000480_HIEN<tab>A pleasure to see you too, Ambassador. Forgive us our late arrival.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000480_HIEN<tab>Moi de même, Monsieur l'ambassadeur. Vous excuserez notre retard.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000490_HIEN<tab>You have our people aboard the airship?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000490_HIEN<tab>Je présume que nos hommes embrigadés de force par l'Empire sont à bord de votre aéronef.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000500_ASAHI<tab>Exactly as agreed. We would leave you in no doubt as to the purity of our intentions. I daresay it was the selfsame spirit of cooperation which prompted you to bring Yotsuyu here today.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000500_ASAHI<tab>Soyez-en sûr. Je devine que vous êtes également prêt à procéder à l'échange, et que c'est pour cette raison que ma sœur vous accompagne.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000510_HIEN<tab>Indeed. Before excluding her from the exchange, I thought it only fair that you see her condition for yourself. Physically, she is in fine health, but her mind is unchanged.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000510_HIEN<tab>Oui, je tenais à ce que vous constatiez son état. Comme vous pouvez le voir, elle est en bonne santé. Hélas, sa mémoire n'est toujours pas revenue.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000520_ASAHI<tab>So I see.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000520_ASAHI<tab>... C'est ce qui semblerait, en effet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000521_ASAHI<tab>But all need not necessarily be lost. In anticipation of this tragic turn of events, I took the liberty of inviting some special guests...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000521_ASAHI<tab>J'ai toutefois pris la liberté d'amener aujourd'hui des gens qui pourront la stimuler.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000530_ASAHIFATHER<tab>(-???-)Ah, Yotsuyu! You look...well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000530_ASAHIFATHER<tab>(-???-)Quel soulagement de t'revoir enfin... Tu... Tu vas bien<var 1D /var>?<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000540_YOTSUYU<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000540_YOTSUYU<tab>Ahrg... Ah...<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000550_HIEN<tab>Of all the people...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000550_HIEN<tab>Ces gens...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000560_ASAHI<tab>Is something wrong, dear sister? These are our beloved parents. Does not the sight of them bring back sweet childhood memories?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000560_ASAHI<tab>Eh bien, Yotsuyu<var 1D /var>? Tu ne reconnais plus nos parents bien-aimés<var 1D /var>? Ils ont pourtant sué sang et eau pour t'élever.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000570_YOTSUYU<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000570_YOTSUYU<tab>Ahhh<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000580_YOTSUYU<tab>...Gosetsu. I have to take this to Gosetsu...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000580_YOTSUYU<tab>Son kaki... Je dois lui apporter...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000590_ASAHI<tab>Hmph. It would seem my little surprise was not sufficient.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000590_ASAHI<tab>Mince... C'était mon dernier atout. Revoir nos parents n'a donc fait ressurgir aucun souvenir chez elle.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000600_ASAHI<tab>You needn't glare at me so, Lord Hien─I merely did what any loving son would do for his family. Lest you doubt, I am content to leave the acting viceroy in your care. Pray treat her as you would any daughter of Doma.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000600_ASAHI<tab>Ne me fusillez pas du regard ainsi, Seigneur Hien. Je reconnais que cette femme n'est plus qu'une simple Domienne et je vous la confie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000610_ASAHI<tab>Do not grow too fond of this place, dear sister. You will come back to us ere long.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000610_ASAHI<tab>Je garde toutefois espoir que tu me reviennes, chère sœur.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000620_HIEN<tab>We continue with the exchange as planned, then.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000620_HIEN<tab>Bien, l'échange se déroulera donc comme nous avions prévu<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000630_ASAHI<tab>Very good. The structure across the river should serve our needs. We shall await you there with the conscripts if you would bring your captives...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000630_ASAHI<tab>Les ins<var 16 /var>tal<var 16 /var>la<var 16 /var>tions de l'autre côté de la rivière devraient convenir. Nous y déposerons vos hommes, et vous viendrez avec nos prisonniers.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000640_HIEN<tab>Agreed. Until then, Ambassador.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000640_HIEN<tab>Je vais préparer leur escorte de ce pas.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000650_HIEN<tab>Gosetsu, are you awake?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000650_HIEN<tab>Gosetsu, tu es réveillé<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000660_GOSETSU<tab>My lord! Come in, come in...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000660_GOSETSU<tab>Mon Seigneur. Je vous en prie, entrez.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000670_GOSETSU<tab>When Tsuyu returned, her eyes were red from weeping. She spoke not a word─simply sat and peeled some fruit she'd brought for me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000670_GOSETSU<tab>Tsuyu est revenue les yeux gonflés par les larmes. Elle m'a gentiment épluché un kaki, mais elle ne m'a pas dit ce qui l'avait mise dans un tel état.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000680_GOSETSU<tab>She then claimed weariness and retired to her chamber. Tell me, what happened to upset her so?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000680_GOSETSU<tab>Pour le moment, elle se repose dans une autre pièce. Dites-moi, Mon Seigneur. Que s'est-il passé<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000690_HIEN<tab>The ambassador arranged a surprise reunion with her foster parents. A misguided attempt to restore Yotsuyu to her senses.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000690_HIEN<tab>L'ambassadeur de Garlemald a osé la mettre face à ses parents adoptifs pour essayer de lui faire recouvrer la mémoire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000700_HIEN<tab>It was plain their presence caused her great distress, but she seemed otherwise unaffected.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000700_HIEN<tab>Ces retrouvailles forcées ont provoqué chez elle une violente migraine. Cela n'a cependant eu aucun effet sur son amnésie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000710_ALISAIE<tab>Yotsuyu was mistreated as a child, was she not? It was a cruel trick to use her tormentors like that, knowing the pain it could cause.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000710_ALISAIE<tab>Ces gens l'ont maltraitée durant son enfance, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>? À mon avis, cela en dit long sur la vraie nature d'Asahi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000720_GOSETSU<tab>Hmph. I like this Asahi less and less...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000720_GOSETSU<tab>Hmm... Je comprends mieux le mutisme de Tsuyu.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000730_HIEN<tab>Be that as it may, he has agreed to allow Yotsuyu to remain with us in Doma. Our primary concern now is to hand over the prisoners without incident, and bring our people safely home.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000730_HIEN<tab>Malgré cette basse manœuvre, l'ambassadeur a consenti à ce que Yotsuyu reste vivre à Doma, il ne nous reste plus qu'à faire l'échange. Espérons qu'il se déroulera sans encombre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000740_ALPHINAUD<tab>There was one other detail at the meeting which caught my attention.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000740_ALPHINAUD<tab>À ce propos, il y a quelque chose qui me tracasse.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000750_ALPHINAUD<tab>I assume you all noticed the rather suspect crates within the castrum? The imperials were quick to retrieve them afterwards, but I wonder...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000750_ALPHINAUD<tab>J'ai aperçu des caisses suspectes lors de l'entretien avec l'ambassadeur à Castrum Fluminis. Elles ont vite été remisées par des soldats impériaux, mais je ne peux m'empêcher de m'interroger sur leur contenu.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000760_ALISAIE<tab>Out with it, Brother. You fear they might contain bombs or war machines?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000760_ALISAIE<tab>J'ai remarqué ça, moi aussi. Les Garlemaldais n'auraient pas osé apporter des explosifs ou des armes magitek, quand même<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000770_HIEN<tab>If the ambassador wanted me dead, he has had ample opportunity. No, assassination is not his intent, but we should be on our guard for other acts of treachery.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000770_HIEN<tab>Per<var 16 /var>son<var 16 /var>nel<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment, j'en doute. S'ils avaient voulu attenter à ma vie, ils auraient déjà pu le faire à maintes reprises. Je ne sais pas ce qu'ils trament, mais une chose est sûre, nous devrons rester aux aguets.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000780_DOMANMAID<tab>My lord! Forgive me, but the lady Yotsuyu─she's gone!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000780_DOMANMAID<tab>Seigneur Hien<var 1D /var>! C'est Yotsuyu<var 1D /var>! Elle... elle a disparu de sa chambre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000790_GOSETSU<tab>Gone!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000790_GOSETSU<tab>Comment ça, disparu<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000800_DOMANMAID<tab>I beg your pardons, my lords. I was certain she had fallen asleep...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000800_DOMANMAID<tab>Pardonnez-moi, Mon Seigneur. C'est ma faute. Je croyais qu'elle dormait et j'ai relâché ma vigilance.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000810_HIEN<tab>No, no, the responsibility is mine. 'Twas I who gave her a room instead of a cell.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000810_HIEN<tab>Ne t'excuse pas. J'ai préféré lui offrir une chambre plutôt que de la placer dans une cellule<var 1D /var>; c'est moi qui suis responsable.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000820_HIEN<tab>She may simply have wandered outside. We will organize search parties.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000820_HIEN<tab>Il se peut qu'elle ait quitté le manoir, auquel cas il faudra nous y mettre à plusieurs pour la retrouver.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000821_HIEN<tab>Might I call upon your assistance?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000821_HIEN<tab>Puis-je compter sur vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000830_ASAHIFATHER<tab>(-???-)Help... Help...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000830_ASAHIFATHER<tab>(-???-)Urgh... argh...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000840_ASAHIFATHER<tab>Help... Help me...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000840_ASAHIFATHER<tab>Ai... Aidez-moi...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000850_YOTSUYU<tab>If only I hadn't remembered.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000850_YOTSUYU<tab>J'aurais pu continuer à vivre sans aucun souvenir de mon passé...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000860_YOTSUYU<tab>He should <var 1A 02 /var>hate<var 1A 01 /var> me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000860_YOTSUYU<tab>Même haïe de tous...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000870_YOTSUYU<tab>But I will not suffer his kindness. Not after what I did to him.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000870_YOTSUYU<tab>Mais qu'un homme sur lequel j'ai tiré me prenne en pitié et m'accorde sa tendresse...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000880_ASAHIFATHER<tab>Who's there!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000880_ASAHIFATHER<tab>(-???-)Hein<var 1D /var>? Qui va là<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000890_ASAHIMOTHER<tab><gasp> ...Oh, it's you. What are you doing out here in the dark?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000890_ASAHIMOTHER<tab>Ah<var 1D /var>! C'est Yotsuyu... Idiote<var 1D /var>! Ça ne va pas de nous fiche la frousse comme ça<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000900_ASAHIFATHER<tab>This is the enclave, is it? When the soldiers dragged us back to Doma, you were the last person I expected to see.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000900_ASAHIFATHER<tab>Le quartier enclavé est à nouveau habité<var 1D /var>? (soupire) On nous conduit de force jusqu'ici, on nous impose de nous réinstaller à Doma, et en plus il faut qu'on se coltine ta présence...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000910_ASAHIMOTHER<tab>You're the bane of our existence, Yotsuyu! A font of misery!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000910_ASAHIMOTHER<tab>Tu es vraiment une plaie, ma parole<var 1D /var>! On ne se débarrassera donc jamais de toi<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000920_ASAHIMOTHER<tab>You couldn't even do us the simple courtesy of dying, could you! Oh no, you had to <var 1A 02 /var>live<var 1A 01 /var> and taint us with the shame of your failure!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000920_ASAHIMOTHER<tab>Non seulement tu n'as pas été à la hauteur de ta fonction de vice-gouverneure, mais en plus tu n'as pas eu la décence de mourir après ton échec<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000930_ASAHIMOTHER<tab>We had a perfect life in the capital! And now they're making us wallow in this muddy ruin like common swine! I don't deserve this!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000930_ASAHIMOTHER<tab>Il a fallu que tu nous entraînes dans ta chute, et nous voilà coincés dans ces ruines boueuses<var 1D /var>! On avait la belle vie à Garlemald, mais c'est fini à cause de toi<var 1D /var>! Comment comptes-tu te faire pardonner, hein<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000940_ASAHIFATHER<tab>Now, now, dear, that'll do. There seems little point in berating the girl when she scarcely remembers her own name. Our time would be better spent contemplating how we're to survive this unhappy predicament.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000940_ASAHIFATHER<tab>Tu t'épuises pour rien, cette fille a plus rien dans la caboche. On devrait plutôt réfléchir à comment tirer notre épingle du jeu maintenant qu'on en est là.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000950_ASAHIFATHER<tab>You've kept your looks at least. I suspect you'd fetch a handsome price with the right buyer. Maybe enough to get us to Kugane and start a new business...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000950_ASAHIFATHER<tab>Hmm... T'as toujours un aussi joli minois, sans parler du reste. J'me demande si tu nous rapporterais pas assez pour payer le passage jusqu'à Kugane et ouvrir un p'tit commerce<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000960_YOTSUYU<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000960_YOTSUYU<tab>Hé hé... hé hé hé...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000970_YOTSUYU<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000970_YOTSUYU<tab>Ha ha ha ha ha...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000971_YOTSUYU<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000971_YOTSUYU<tab>Haa...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000980_YOTSUYU<tab>Ah, my beloved parents. No sooner do I wake from gentle slumber than the world returns in all its cruelty. Yes, this is how it always was. How it was meant to be.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000980_YOTSUYU<tab>Je reconnais bien là les parents adoptifs qui m'ont accablée. Il suffit que je reprenne mes esprits pour retrouver l'enfer que j'ai toujours connu.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000990_YOTSUYU<tab>Very well. If I cannot escape my nature, then I shall embrace it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000990_YOTSUYU<tab>Eh bien soit. Puisque le destin s'acharne tant à me pousser dans l'abîme de la cruauté, je m'y abandonnerai jusqu'à mon dernier souffle.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001000_YOTSUYU<tab>To the very depths I have sunk, my soul steeped in spite and rotten to the core. The self-righteous hide behind “justice,” but I need no such mask.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001000_YOTSUYU<tab>Je vais m'enfoncer dans les ténèbres de la haine et me fondre en elles. Tout désir de justice n'est qu'hypocrisie, car le mal est ma seule raison d'être...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001010_YOTSUYU<tab>Father. Mother. Was it not you who made me into this monster? Who taught me the truth of this miserable world?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001010_YOTSUYU<tab>Qui m'a convaincue que c'était là ma nature à force de m'humilier et de me rabaisser<var 1D /var>? N'est-ce pas vous qui avez fait de moi celle que je suis aujourd'hui<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001020_YOTSUYU<tab>For years I knew naught but the taste of pain and humiliation, but the time has come to savor my vengeance against Doma. Against all my enemies.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001020_YOTSUYU<tab>Ahh... La roue a fini par tourner... Mes chers parents... Ma chère patrie...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001021_YOTSUYU<tab>And it begins...with you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001021_YOTSUYU<tab>Je vous hais de tout mon être<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001030_ASAHIFATHER<tab>Yotsuyu...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001030_ASAHIFATHER<tab>Yotsuyu<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001040_ASAHIFATHER<tab>What...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001040_ASAHIFATHER<tab>Gouargh... Qu'est-ce... que...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001050_ASAHIMOTHER<tab>No!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001050_ASAHIMOTHER<tab>Hiiii<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001060_ASAHI<tab>Well done, dear sister. Did I not say you would come back to us?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001060_ASAHI<tab>Yotsuyu... Je savais que tu finirais par redevenir toi-même.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001070_YOTSUYU<tab>Brother dearest. What a surprise.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001070_YOTSUYU<tab>J'me disais bien qu'ces retrouvailles n'étaient pas le fruit du hasard.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001080_YOTSUYU<tab>You always were a cold-blooded little worm. I doubt you thought twice about sending our parents to their deaths.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001080_YOTSUYU<tab>Tu n'as pas hésité à sacrifier tes parents pour arriver à tes fins. Tu restes pourri jusqu'à la moelle.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001090_ASAHI<tab>Your dagger yet drips with their blood and you presume to judge <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var>? To be frank, I didn't think you had the strength to slay them so cleanly. A single thrust each... I'm impressed!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001090_ASAHI<tab>Dit celle qui vient de tuer de sang-froid ceux qui l'ont élevée... En tout cas, bravo. Tu les as abattus d'un coup de couteau, toi qui as toujours été si frêle.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001100_ASAHI<tab>But surely you can't be satisfied with murdering a pair of doddering elders. You yearn for a deeper vengeance...and the power to see it through.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001100_ASAHI<tab>Ce n'étaient que deux vieillards, ceci dit. Que dirais-tu si je t'offrais le pouvoir de te venger de tous ceux qui t'ont un jour fait souffrir<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001110_ASAHIFATHER<tab>Please... I don't want to die...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001110_ASAHIFATHER<tab>J'veux... (tousse)... J'veux... pas... mourir...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001120_HIEN<tab>Any sign of her?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001120_HIEN<tab>Tu as retrouvé sa trace<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001130_HIEN<tab>...What happened here?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001130_HIEN<tab>Ce sont ses parents<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001140_HIEN<tab>I knew what would happen if she recovered, and <var 1A 02 /var>still<var 1A 01 /var> I did nothing. ...You say she left with her brother?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001140_HIEN<tab>Yotsuyu aurait donc recouvré la mémoire, avant d'assassiner ses parents adoptifs, puis de partir avec Asahi...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001150_HIEN<tab>Whatever he wants with her, he was willing to pay for it with his parents' lives...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001150_HIEN<tab>C'est ce dernier qui m'inquiète. Il n'a pas hésité à sacrifier son père et sa mère. Qu'est-ce qu'il peut bien manigancer<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001160_HIEN<tab>But this is neither the time nor the place. We must gather the others.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001160_HIEN<tab>Quoi qu'il en soit, ce n'est pas l'endroit pour se livrer à des conjectures. Réunissons plutôt tout le monde au manoir pour entendre l'avis de chacun.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001170_ASAHI<tab>At last, the hour has come. The conclusion to these negotiations will mark a new beginning for Doma and the Empire─a first step on the road to peaceful coexistence!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001170_ASAHI<tab>Nous y voilà enfin. Cet échange de prisonniers constitue le premier pas vers une coexistence pacifique entre Garlemald et Doma. La date est à marquer d'une pierre blanche<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001180_HIEN<tab>Indeed. We are ready to proceed with the exchange when you are.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001180_HIEN<tab>J'espère moi aussi que ce grand jour se déroulera sans anicroche.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001190_HIEN<tab>Forgive my curiosity, Ambassador, but is there a purpose to these containers you bring with you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001190_HIEN<tab>À propos, je n'ai pas pu m'empêcher de remarquer ces caisses que vous avez apportées. Je suis curieux de savoir ce qu'elles renferment.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001200_ASAHI<tab>Oh, the supply crates? They are filled with materials we hoped might be of use in Doma's restoration. I meant to gift them to you at our last meeting, but we had so much else to discuss...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001200_ASAHI<tab>Ah, ça<var 1D /var>? J'ai pensé que quelques matériaux pourraient aider à la recon<var 16 /var>struc<var 16 /var>tion de Doma. Je comptais vous offrir ce modeste présent lors de notre dernière rencontre, mais malheureusement le moment ne m'a pas semblé opportun.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001210_HIEN<tab>How very generous. I confess, I had not expected such compassion, welcome though it is.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001210_HIEN<tab>Vraiment<var 1D /var>? L'attention me touche, je ne m'attendais pas à tant de considération...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001220_HIEN<tab>...But then I was <var 1A 02 /var>also<var 1A 01 /var> surprised by the news that one of our captives had delivered herself into your custody ahead of time─a minor discrepancy I shall overlook in the spirit of the occasion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001220_HIEN<tab>Il semblerait également qu'une des personnes que nous devions vous remettre vous ait déjà rejoint. Mais je suis prêt à fermer les yeux sur ce petit incident et à poursuivre notre échange pour le bien de tous.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001230_YOTSUYU<tab>Are you perhaps referring to me, Lord Hien?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001230_YOTSUYU<tab>On parle de moi<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001240_HIEN<tab>Yotsuyu.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001240_HIEN<tab>Yotsuyu...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001250_YOTSUYU<tab>Orphan of the Naeuri, widow of Sashihai...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001250_YOTSUYU<tab>Oui, c'est mon nom, mais on m'appelle aussi Naeuri la martyre, Sashihai la veuve noire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001260_YOTSUYU<tab>...And acting viceroy of Doma! You and your people are mine to govern; mine to punish!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001260_YOTSUYU<tab>Et je suis la vice-gouverneure de Doma, celle qui vous dirige tous et qui vous fait ramper à ses pieds<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001270_HIEN<tab>Well, well. It would seem your shattered mind is mended. As per our agreement with the ambassador, you are free to return with him to the Empire.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001270_HIEN<tab>Puisque tu as recouvré la mémoire, tu fais désormais partie des prisonniers qui seront relâchés. Libre à toi de rentrer à Garlemald en compagnie de monsieur l'ambassadeur.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001271_HIEN<tab>Your authority as acting viceroy, however, is no longer recognized here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001271_HIEN<tab>En revanche, je ne te permets pas de revendiquer le titre de vice-gouverneure, cette époque est révolue.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001280_YOTSUYU<tab>My position is not for you to decide, little lordling.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001280_YOTSUYU<tab>Ah ah ah<var 1D /var>! Quelle blague<var 1D /var>! Tu n'es rien de plus que le chefaillon d'un groupe de rebelles<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001290_YOTSUYU<tab>All who resist the rule of the Empire must be purged. Such was the order given to me by Lord Zenos himself!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001290_YOTSUYU<tab>“Purge tous ceux qui s'opposent à la domination de l'Empire.” C'est l'unique ordre que le seigneur Zenos m'a donné<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001300_YOTSUYU<tab>I will reign here in this putrid, pestilent swamp until the last of you has been broken!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001300_YOTSUYU<tab>J'entends bien l'exécuter et continuer de faire régner la terreur sur les gueux infects peuplant la fange qu'est ce pays<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001310_YOTSUYU<tab>This land shall know no dawn. I will spew forth darkness and drown all in eternal night. And high above you I shall shine uncaring, cold and distant as the moon!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001310_YOTSUYU<tab>L'aube ne se lèvera plus sur ces terres. Mes ténèbres vont les engloutir, et je serai la seule à briller, telle une lune glaciale dans une nuit éternelle<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001320_HIEN<tab>What has she done!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001320_HIEN<tab>D'où vient cette lumière<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001330_ALPHINAUD<tab>Oh, gods... This is a summoning!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001330_ALPHINAUD<tab>Une Primordiale<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001340_ASAHI<tab>A Doman citizen has called forth an eikon in direct violation of our primary agreement. The negotiations have failed. Abandon the captives, and make preparations to withdraw.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001340_ASAHI<tab>Maxima. Cette Domienne vient d'invoquer une Primordiale. C'est une violation du traité de paix conclu avec l'Empire. Cessez im<var 16 /var>mé<var 16 /var>dia<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment l'échange de prisonniers et préparez-vous au départ. Nous rentrons.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001350_MAXIMA<tab>But, Ambassador...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001350_MAXIMA<tab>Mais vous ne pouvez pas faire ça<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001360_ASAHI<tab>Disobey me, Pilus, and you disobey the Emperor. Make preparations to withdraw─<var 1A 02 /var>now<var 1A 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001360_ASAHI<tab>En tant qu'ambassadeur plénipotentiaire, je représente l'autorité de l'Empereur. Vous n'oseriez tout de même pas discuter mes ordres, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>? Préparez-vous à partir sur-le-champ.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001370_MAXIMA<tab>...As you command.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001370_MAXIMA<tab>Je... À vos ordres<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001380_YUGIRI<tab>My lord! You must fall back!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001380_YUGIRI<tab>Mon Seigneur, nous devons fuir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001390_HIEN<tab>You ask me to run!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001390_HIEN<tab>Je ne peux pas <var 08 E905 ((la)) ((le)) /var> laisser seul<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Leave this to me!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Laissez-moi m'occuper de Yotsuyu<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>A strategic withdrawal!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ne soyez pas téméraire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001400_HIEN<tab>Bah... Against such a foe, I would be more hindrance than help. The field is yours!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001400_HIEN<tab>Tu as raison. Je ne ferais que te gêner contre une Primordiale. Merci et bon courage, mon ami<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001410_HIEN<tab>Spare my pride, would you? I know this foe is beyond me. The field is yours!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001410_HIEN<tab>Il faut savoir admettre quand on n'est pas de taille, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>? Je compte sur toi pour nous débarrasser de cette Primordiale. Merci et bon courage, mon ami<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001420_HIEN<tab>We will withdraw...but not without our countrymen. I want every soul accounted for. Every soul!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001420_HIEN<tab>Replions-nous<var 1D /var>! Yugiri, veille à ce que tous nos hommes soient évacués<var 1D /var>! Cette fois nous n'abandonnons personne<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001430_YUGIRI<tab>My lord!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001430_YUGIRI<tab>Comptez sur moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001440_TSUKUYOMI<tab>(-???-)I knew you would not flee. I see now the strength which flows from that baleful light of yours.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001440_TSUKUYOMI<tab>(-???-)Je savais que je te trouverais sur ma route. Je peux désormais sentir émaner de toi le pouvoir maudit de la Lumière.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001450_TSUKUYOMI<tab>(-Tsukuyomi-)But I am become Tsukuyomi, goddess of the moon and divinity of night. What power can compare to such celestial majesty!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001450_TSUKUYOMI<tab>(-???-)Mais ce n'est qu'un fétu de paille comparé à la puissance que me confère le Masokagami. Il a fait de moi une déesse... Tsukuyomi, la Maîtresse de la lune et de la nuit<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001460_TSUKUYOMI<tab>I shall plunge all I despise into darkness! And within that black abyss, even your light shall flicker and fail.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001460_TSUKUYOMI<tab>Je vais contenter le dernier ressentiment implacable qui me ronge<var 1D /var>! Ni toi ni personne ne pourra m'en empêcher<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001470_TSUKUYOMI<tab>Come, let us cast the stalks and look upon the fate of Doma. I see a future in which the sun sets on this wretched land once and for all!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001470_TSUKUYOMI<tab>Que réserve l'avenir à Doma<var 1D /var>? Une nouvelle aube... ou une nuit sans fin<var 1D /var>? Notre combat en décidera<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001480_YOTSUYU<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001480_YOTSUYU<tab>Ahh... Ahh... Ahhhh...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001490_YOTSUYU<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001490_YOTSUYU<tab>Argh...<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001500_ASAHI<tab>You really must learn to finish the job.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001500_ASAHI<tab>Fais un peu attention<var 1D /var>! Tu allais oublier de lui donner le coup de grâce...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001510_ASAHI<tab>'Tis true that a gaudy mirror and a handful of crystals make for a feeble summoning, but even the weakest eikon is a god of sorts. A threat that must be put down.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001510_ASAHI<tab>Malgré le miroir extorqué aux Kojin et nos cristaux, cette divinité était pour le moins pitoyable. Cela dit, mieux vaut ne pas sous-estimer son pouvoir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001520_ASAHI<tab>My, my, such hostility! These beings are the sworn enemies of the Empire─I merely did my duty as an imperial officer.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001520_ASAHI<tab>Je ne comprends pas ton émoi. Les Primordiaux sont une menace qui concerne chacun de nous, je te le rappelle. Il va de soi que nous collaborions afin de les exterminer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001530_ASAHI<tab>Will you surrender to anger, then? Slay an anointed emissary to avenge a fallen foe?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001530_ASAHI<tab>Tu ne comptes tout de même pas céder à la tentation de me tuer, moi le re<var 16 /var>pré<var 16 /var>sen<var 16 /var>tant de l'Empire<var 1D /var>!? Qui plus est pour venger une femme qui était ton ennemie<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001540_ASAHI<tab>You cannot, of course. To do so would burn the bridges we have labored so hard to build!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001540_ASAHI<tab>Bien sûr que non<var 1D /var>! La paix entre Garlemald et Doma est beaucoup trop chère à tes yeux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001550_ASAHI<tab>Ah, but I'm forgetting: they're already ash! This <var 1A 02 /var>Doman<var 1A 01 /var> woman has seen to that! The Empire cannot ally itself with any nation that refuses to renounce summoning. I believe I was most clear on that point!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001550_ASAHI<tab>Ah, mais qu'est-ce que je raconte<var 1D /var>? Ces espoirs se sont déjà volatilisés. Après tout, une Domienne vient d'enfreindre notre traité en invoquant une Primordiale<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001560_ASAHI<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001560_ASAHI<tab>Ha ha ha ha ha<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001570_ASAHI<tab>It should have been mine.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001570_ASAHI<tab>C'est moi qui aurais dû remplir sa fonction...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001580_ASAHI<tab>The power he bestowed upon her... I should have been the one to govern Doma! <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> would have repaid his faith!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001580_ASAHI<tab>Jamais Doma ne serait retombée aux mains de l'ennemi si j'avais été nommé vice-gouverneur<var 1D /var>! J'étais le mieux qualifié pour suppléer le seigneur Zenos<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001581_ASAHI<tab>No one alive loves him more than I!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001581_ASAHI<tab>J'étais le seul qui pouvait répondre à ses attentes<var 1D /var>! Le seul<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001590_ASAHI<tab>Instead, this <var 1A 02 /var>harlot<var 1A 01 /var> betrayed his trust!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001590_ASAHI<tab>Mais c'est cette traînée qui a été choisie<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001600_ASAHI<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Useless...piece of...filth<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001600_ASAHI<tab>Cette bonne à rien<var 1D /var>! Cette garce<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001610_ASAHI<tab>Worthless whore!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001610_ASAHI<tab>Cette sale pouffiasse<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001620_ASAHI<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001620_ASAHI<tab>Gouargh...<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001630_YOTSUYU<tab>Thank you, dear brother...for this precious gift. Vengeance.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001630_YOTSUYU<tab>Merci... Asahi... Sans toi... jamais je n'aurais pu m'venger...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001640_YOTSUYU<tab>These people...<var 1A 02 /var>our<var 1A 01 /var> people...they ignore the corruption which festers beneath the surface. Cast aside that which is dirty and broken. Speak not of things which would disrupt their dreary little lives.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001640_YOTSUYU<tab>Les Domiens sont tous les mêmes... Ils dissimulent leurs vices derrière un masque de fausse vertu... Ils détournent le regard face aux infamies... et traitent en parias ceux qui en sont victimes...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001650_YOTSUYU<tab>Like you, Asahi...always pretending not to see. You were the first...the first I swore to kill.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001650_YOTSUYU<tab>Pendant qu'on me molestait... tu as toujours feint de ne rien voir, Asahi... Voilà pourquoi de tous les Domiens... c'est toi que j'ai haï le premier<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001660_ASAHI<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001660_ASAHI<tab>Argh<var 1D /var>!<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001670_YOTSUYU<tab>Ahhh...such bliss. I had thought my hunger insatiable...but now...now I am satisfied.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001670_YOTSUYU<tab>Aaah<var 1D /var>!<var 1D /var>... Quelle extase... Moi qui pensais que le puits sans fond de mon âme ne pouvait être comblé... je me trompais...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001680_YOTSUYU<tab>You should feel honored, dear brother. I saved the last of my strength just...for you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001680_YOTSUYU<tab>J'ai gardé mes dernières forces... pour enfin assouvir ma vengeance... sur toi...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001690_YOTSUYU<tab>What's the matter? The witch of Doma will soon be dead.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001690_YOTSUYU<tab>Pourquoi fais-tu cette tête, toi...<var 1D /var>? Celle qui a tant persécuté le peuple domien quitte ce monde... Ça devrait te réjouir...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Gosetsu will mourn you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Gosetsu te pleurera, lui.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Tsuyu deserved a kinder fate.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Je voudrais, mais je ne peux pas...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001700_YOTSUYU<tab>He will mourn Tsuyu, perhaps...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001700_YOTSUYU<tab>Ce vieux balourd<var 1D /var>?<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001710_YOTSUYU<tab>Her happiness was never to be... Not in this world.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001710_YOTSUYU<tab>Tu penses à ce vieux balourd<var 1D /var>?<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001720_YOTSUYU<tab>I wonder... Was the fruit as sweet...as he remembered...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001720_YOTSUYU<tab>Le kaki que je lui ai épluché... je me demande... s'il lui a plu...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001730_ASAHI<tab>Lord Zenos...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001730_ASAHI<tab>Haa... Haa... Seigneur Zenos...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001740_ASAHI<tab>Lord Zenos!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001740_ASAHI<tab>Asahi sas Brutus, au rapport<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001750_ASAHI<tab>I am at your disposal.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001750_ASAHI<tab>Vous m'avez fait demander, Seigneur Zenos<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001760_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)Asahi. You were born of Doma, yes?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001760_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos<var 1D /var>?-)Dis-moi, Asahi. Tu es Domien, si ma mémoire est bonne.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001770_ASAHI<tab>Yes, my lord! I am honored that you would remember me. How may I serve?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001770_ASAHI<tab>Tout à fait, Votre Altesse<var 1D /var>! Je suis honoré que vous portiez un tel intérêt à ma personne<var 1D /var>! Je suis prêt à exécuter tous vos ordres<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001780_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)You are hereby appointed ambassador plenipotentiary, and empowered to speak with the voice of the Emperor. Return to your native land of Doma, and announce your intention to sue for peace.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001780_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos<var 1D /var>?-)Bien. Je te nomme ambassadeur plénipotentiaire. Tu vas représenter Sa Majesté l'empereur Varis à Doma pour y conduire des négociations de paix.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001790_ASAHI<tab>...For peace?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001790_ASAHI<tab>Des négociations de paix, Votre Altesse<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001800_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)Once negotiations are underway, you are to locate the acting viceroy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001800_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos<var 1D /var>?-)Exactement. Mais ce n'est pas tout, tu devras également chercher Yotsuyu.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001810_ASAHI<tab>She <var 1A 02 /var>lives<var 1A 01 /var>? That is to say─I will, my lord.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001810_ASAHI<tab>Ma sœur serait donc encore en vie<var 1D /var>? Votre volonté sera faite, je vous l'assure, Votre Altesse<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001820_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)When you have found her, you will initiate a ritual to call forth an eikon. I will instruct you in the necessary steps.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001820_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos<var 1D /var>?-)Avant que tu ne partes, je vais t'enseigner le rituel d'invocation secret des Primordiaux. Tu devras à ton tour le transmettre à Yotsuyu quand tu l'auras retrouvée.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001830_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)Yotsuyu's faith is unreliable. But as a child raised to believe in the kami, she will serve as a vessel for one of the Kojin's gods. She need only wish it to be so.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001830_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos<var 1D /var>?-)Elle n'a pro<var 16 /var>ba<var 16 /var>ble<var 16 /var>ment aucune foi religieuse, mais étant originaire de ces contrées orientales où sont révérées des myriades de kami, elle fera par<var 16 /var>fai<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment l'affaire. Il suffira d'un artefact kojin et de ses désirs pour qu'elle prenne la forme d'une divinité.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001840_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)The power will seem a gift, but the eikon's essence will consume her. She will be no more than a husk, a slave to whim and desire.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001840_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos<var 1D /var>?-)Naturellement, une femme aussi veule qu'elle ne pourra pas imposer sa volonté. Une fois le Primordial invoqué, elle en deviendra la prisonnière, comme une âme inerte, dépourvue de tout libre arbitre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001850_ASAHI<tab>My lord, ever since the day you saw fit to save my miserable life, I have dreamed of repaying your benevolence. Upon my honor, I swear to devote myself wholly to your service. All that you command will be done, no matter the cost.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001850_ASAHI<tab>Votre Altesse, depuis que vous avez jugé bon de me sauver la vie sur le champ de bataille, mon seul but a été de repayer ma dette envers vous. J'exécuterai vos ordres à la lettre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001860_ASAHI<tab>B-But...I fear the subtleties of your plan yet elude me. From the reports I have heard, the champion who aids the Doman resistance would make short work of a single eikon...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001860_ASAHI<tab>Toutefois, sans vouloir vous manquer de respect, je comprends mal l'intérêt d'une telle invocation. Nous savons que les rebelles sont accompagnés d'une personne capable de vaincre les Primordiaux. Accepteriez-vous de partager avec moi le fond de votre pensée<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001870_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)The eikon is merely a message. The pacifist teachings of the Populares spread through this city like a plague, and I would remind the people of the threat we face.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001870_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos<var 1D /var>?-)Hmpf... Peut-être le sais-tu, mais un groupe de pacifistes et idéalistes qui se fait appeler les Populares commence à gagner en influence chez nous. Quelqu'un se doit de leur rappeler la menace que re<var 16 /var>pré<var 16 /var>sen<var 16 /var>tent les sauvages et leurs Primordiaux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001880_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)You will be my chosen agent─the hand which tolls the warning bell. The salvation of this world will not be won through the signing of treaties.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001880_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos<var 1D /var>?-)Et tu es celui qui va m'aider à leur faire comprendre. Il en va de l'avenir de notre monde. Je peux compter sur toi, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001890_ASAHI<tab>Your chosen agent!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001890_ASAHI<tab>C'est un immense honneur que vous me faites<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001900_ASAHI<tab>I will not fail you, my lord!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001900_ASAHI<tab>Je ne vous décevrai pas, Votre Altesse<var 1D /var>! Vous avez ma parole<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001910_ASAHI<tab>My... My master... Lord Zenos... He will come...for you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001910_ASAHI<tab>Tu ne perds rien pour attendre...<var 1D /var>! Seigneur Zenos... Mon maître, mon guide<var 1D /var>! Il viendra prendre sa revanche... et il t'anéantira...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001920_HIEN<tab>You have prevailed, I see!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001920_HIEN<tab>Les kami soient loués<var 1D /var>! Tu vas bien<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001930_GOSETSU<tab>She is gone.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001930_GOSETSU<tab>Tsuyu... Elle... Elle est morte...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001940_GOSETSU<tab>Wherefore did the kami spare us only to inflict this pain...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001940_GOSETSU<tab>Le destin est bien trop cruel...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001950_GOSETSU<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001950_GOSETSU<tab>(fond en larme)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001960_HIEN<tab>Death shall not want for company this day. You spared us a worse disaster, but I fear our fledgling peace with the Empire was beyond saving.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001960_HIEN<tab>Yotsuyu et l'ambassadeur sont morts. Bien qu'une menace ait été écartée, je crains que cet incident ne mette fin à nos espoirs de paix avec l'Empire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001970_MAXIMA<tab>Lord Hien!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001970_MAXIMA<tab>Attendez un instant, s'il vous plaît<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001980_HIEN<tab>Maxima, is it not? I assumed you long fled.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001980_HIEN<tab>Vous êtes encore là<var 1D /var>? Je pensais que vous aviez pris vos jambes à votre cou. Que voulez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001990_MAXIMA<tab>I entertain thoughts of escape even now. But our negotiations have yet to reach a satisfying conclusion. The ambassador insisted that the summoning spelled an end to our mission here, but it seemed to me there was more to the tale...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001990_MAXIMA<tab>Lorsque l'ambassadeur a déclaré que l'invocation de cette Primordiale violait notre accord de paix, j'ai préféré ne pas le contredire, mais j'ai mon opinion sur la question...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I saw a vision of Asahi's past...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>J'ai eu une vision du passé. Je sais pourquoi il a agi ainsi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Zenos was behind this plot.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>C'est Zenos qui se cache derrière tout ça.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002000_MAXIMA<tab>I have heard tell of this power you wield. And in your vision, you witnessed Lord Zenos giving these orders?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002000_MAXIMA<tab>Vous affirmez que cette mission lui a été secrètement confiée par le seigneur Zenos<var 1D /var>!? La rumeur était donc vraie<var 1D /var>: vous possédez cet étrange pouvoir qui permet de voir le passé<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002010_HIEN<tab>But how can that be? Zenos is dead. He took his own life after the battle in Ala Mhigo.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002010_HIEN<tab>Un instant<var 1D /var>! Zenos, vivant<var 1D /var>? Tu l'as pourtant vaincu après qu'il a fusionné avec Shinryu, et il a mis fin à ses jours à l'issue du combat<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002020_HIEN<tab>I saw his body with my own eyes!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002020_HIEN<tab>Sa dépouille gisait à même le sol des jardins du palais d'Ala Mhigo. Je l'ai vue de mes propres yeux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002030_MAXIMA<tab>Forgive me, but Lord Zenos is very much alive─he granted our party an audience prior to our departure. That he was gravely wounded is certain, but his recovery appeared to be proceeding apace.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002030_MAXIMA<tab>Si je puis me permettre, c'est tout bonnement impossible<var 1D /var>! Moi et les autres officiers l'avons vu lors d'une audience avant d'être dépêchés ici. Son Altesse est certes revenue blessée de Doma, mais elle est ac<var 16 /var>tu<var 16 /var>el<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment en convalescence.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002040_ALPHINAUD<tab>I am afraid I share Lord Hien's confusion. The man's death was confirmed and his remains interred. These are matters of public record.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002040_ALPHINAUD<tab>C'est absurde<var 1D /var>! Zenos est bel et bien mort, nous l'avons même mis en terre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002050_MAXIMA<tab>...Hmm. I have no doubt you believe what you say.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002050_MAXIMA<tab>Je devine à la sincérité de votre ton que vous n'essayez pas de me duper.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002060_MAXIMA<tab>But what then is the explanation? That an impostor has infiltrated the innermost circle of the imperial court? The idea is inconceivable, <var 1A 02 /var>absurd<var 1A 01 /var>...but worthy of investigation nonetheless. Our movement can ill afford to have a highly placed pretender undermining our efforts...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002060_MAXIMA<tab>Si ce que vous dites est vrai, si seigneur Zenos est mort, et qu'un imposteur a infiltré Garlemald en usurpant ses traits, puis saboté nos efforts de paix, alors mon pays court lui aussi un grave danger.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002070_HIEN<tab>Your efforts may yet bear fruit. Tell me, what is to become of our prisoner exchange? Though we have already taken custody of our conscripts, we have yet to release your imperial comrades. Do you still intend to collect them?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002070_HIEN<tab>Dans ce cas, que faites-vous de l'échange de prisonniers<var 1D /var>? Nous avons déjà évacué tous les Domiens que vous reteniez, mais je suis toujours disposé à relâcher les soldats garlemaldais.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002080_MAXIMA<tab>Ah. Yes, as the late ambassador's second-in-command, it falls to me to speak on the Empire's behalf. And I am happy to confirm our intent to proceed according to the original agreement.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002080_MAXIMA<tab>En tant que second, je suis habilité à poursuivre les pourparlers dans l'éventualité du décès de l'ambassadeur. Et c'est en adéquation avec mes convictions de Populares.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002090_HIEN<tab>Then let us be about it. 'Twould be a pity to abandon such a promising beginning.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002090_HIEN<tab>Alors, finissons cet échange et faisons en sorte d'encourager la paix naissante entre nos deux pays.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002100_MAXIMA<tab>Indeed. You have my thanks, Lord Hien. As soon as our people are secure aboard our airship, we shall depart straightways for Garlemald.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002100_MAXIMA<tab>Je vous remercie, Seigneur Hien. Je décollerai dès que les prisonniers seront montés à bord. Une fois de retour à Garlemald, j'enquêterai personnellement au sujet de vos troublantes affirmations.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002110_HIEN<tab>Tread lightly, Pilus. I sense treachery awaits you there.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002110_HIEN<tab>Je pressens l'ombre d'un terrible complot. Soyez très prudent, surtout.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002120_ALPHINAUD<tab>Might I accompany you to the capital?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002120_ALPHINAUD<tab>Accepteriez-vous que je vous accompagne<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002130_ALISAIE<tab>Alphinaud! Have you gone mad!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002130_ALISAIE<tab>Alphinaud<var 1D /var>!? Tu as perdu la tête<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002140_ALPHINAUD<tab>Impostor or no, if Zenos was instructing Asahi on the finer points of ritual summoning, then experience tells us there is an Ascian waiting in the wings.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002140_ALPHINAUD<tab>Si Zenos est revenu d'entre les morts pour enseigner la manière d'invoquer un Primordial à Asahi, vous pouvez être certains que les Asciens trempent dans cette affaire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002150_ALPHINAUD<tab>Without our knowledge and expertise, our new friends will be hard-pressed to contend with a foe for whom death is but a minor inconvenience. They need our help.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002150_ALPHINAUD<tab>Sachant que ce sont des êtres incorporels, je crains qu'il soit difficile de les démasquer sans l'expertise que nous avons acquise en luttant contre eux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002160_MAXIMA<tab>Were you indeed willing to share your knowledge of this enemy, we would not shun your counsel.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002160_MAXIMA<tab>Vous vous proposez de partager avec nous votre savoir sur ces Asciens<var 1D /var>? J'accepterais avec plaisir, mais vous devez être conscient des risques que vous encourez en venant avec nous...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002170_HIEN<tab>You truly mean to do this? In full knowledge of the danger?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002170_HIEN<tab>Vous me semblez avoir pris cette décision en toute con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>san<var 16 /var>ce de cause, Alphinaud. Je suppose donc que vous estimez cette expédition assez importante pour risquer votre vie<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002180_ALPHINAUD<tab>I have seen the Warrior of Light risk his life on countless occasions. Next to him, I am scarce more than a distraction on the battlefield.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002180_ALPHINAUD<tab>En effet... J'ai pu voir notre ami faire le même choix encore et encore au cours de nos voyages. Et bien entendu, je sais pertinemment que je ne lui arrive pas à la cheville...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002190_ALPHINAUD<tab>I have seen the Warrior of Light risk her life on countless occasions. Next to her, I am scarce more than a distraction on the battlefield.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002190_ALPHINAUD<tab>En effet... J'ai pu voir notre amie faire le même choix encore et encore au cours de nos voyages. Et bien entendu, je sais pertinemment que je ne lui arrive pas à la cheville...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002200_ALPHINAUD<tab>But in the meeting room or the audience chamber, <var 1A 02 /var>there<var 1A 01 /var> I can make a difference. I can strike bargains, forge ties, and change minds. And where better to do these things than in the home of our old enemy?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002200_ALPHINAUD<tab>Cependant, je pense être capable d'aider deux partis longtemps ennemis à tisser une relation et à se rapprocher.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>This is your moment!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Alphinaud, le négociateur<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I believe in you, Alphinaud!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>On a confiance en vous, Alphinaud.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002210_HIEN<tab>'Tis not for me to stop you─but I would have you consider an alternative arrangement. Rather than braving the Empire as a simple traveler, go forth as an emissary of Doma. Such a position should offer you some measure of protection.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002210_HIEN<tab>Très bien. Si tel est votre choix, je vous désigne comme l'envoyé officiel de Doma. Ce statut diplomatique vous procurera une plus grande sécurité que si vous étiez un simple voyageur.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002220_ALISAIE<tab>Go, then. You've obviously made up your mind.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002220_ALISAIE<tab>(soupire) Je sais que je ne te retirerai pas cette idée de la tête, alors vas-y, fais comme tu veux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002221_ALISAIE<tab>Just try not to do anything reckless, all right?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002221_ALISAIE<tab>Mais promets-moi d'être prudent, d'accord<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002230_ALPHINAUD<tab>I shall be on my best behavior. Farewell, my friends.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002230_ALPHINAUD<tab>Tu as ma parole, Alisaie. Merci à vous tous pour votre soutien. Nous nous reverrons très bientôt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002240_HIEN<tab>How often have I imagined this moment... Thank you for helping it come to pass.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002240_HIEN<tab>J'ai tant attendu ce moment... Merci. Sans toi, je n'aurais jamais assisté à ces émouvantes réunions.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002250_GOSETSU<tab>Ah, there you are.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002250_GOSETSU<tab>Ah, vous étiez tous là.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002260_ALISAIE<tab>Gosetsu, your hair!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002260_ALISAIE<tab>Go... Gosetsu<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002270_YUGIRI<tab>My friend... What have you done...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002270_YUGIRI<tab>Ce crâne rasé... Ça veut dire ce que je pense<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002280_GOSETSU<tab>An old man who cannot raise his blade has no place in the service of a young lord.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002280_GOSETSU<tab>Que veux-tu que j'te dise<var 1D /var>? J'aurais bien du mal à servir notre jeune seigneur sans être capable de soulever mon sabre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002290_GOSETSU<tab>Thus did I decide to devote my remaining days to pilgrimage. I will walk this land, offering prayers of repose for all the souls who left this life in suffering.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002290_GOSETSU<tab>J'ai choisi de me faire moine. Ainsi, je compte voyager et célébrer un office pour l'âme de chaque victime de ces temps troublés.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002300_HIEN<tab>...All of them?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002300_HIEN<tab>Chaque victime, hein<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Safe travels, Gosetsu!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Votre nouvelle coupe va faire fureur<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Don't leave us, Gosetsu!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ne nous abandonnez pas, Gosetsu<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002310_GOSETSU<tab>A fulsome farewell makes for an enjoyable journey!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002310_GOSETSU<tab>Ah ah ah<var 1D /var>! Voilà comment j'aime mes au revoir, dans une ambiance joviale<var 1D /var>! Je vais pouvoir prendre la route d'un pas allègre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002320_GOSETSU<tab>This is no forlorn and final farewell! Send me on my way with a smile, my friends!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002320_GOSETSU<tab>Ah ah ah<var 1D /var>! Ce ne sont pas des adieux, voyons<var 1D /var>! Nous nous reverrons, alors je veux que vous me souhaitiez au revoir avec le sourire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002330_HIEN<tab>Scarcely have we said our good-byes to Alphinaud, and you leave us too. Ah, but 'tis well that my companions find their own way forward. I must endeavor to do the same.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002330_HIEN<tab>D'abord Alphinaud, maintenant toi... Je vous admire. Vous avez choisi chacun votre voie et vous vous y êtes engagés avec assurance. Je me dois d'en prendre de la graine.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002340_GOSETSU<tab>I have faith that you will find the best path for Doma without me, my lord. Pray forgive me this last act of selfishness, and grant me your blessing.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002340_GOSETSU<tab>Mon Seigneur, je suis convaincu que vos décisions et vos actions apporteront paix et prospérité à Doma. Et j'espère que vous ne tiendrez pas rigueur à votre bon vieux Gosetsu pour cet ultime caprice.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002350_HIEN<tab>You have earned it. A thousand times over!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002350_HIEN<tab>Bon vent, mon ami<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002360_HIEN<tab>Go in peace, my friend. I shall make of Doma a land where children laugh and none need live in fear.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002360_HIEN<tab>Je t'en fais la promesse, Gosetsu. Je continuerai à travailler sans relâche avec notre peuple pour faire de Doma un pays où tout enfant grandit choyé de ses parents.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002370_GOSETSU<tab>There is no better way to honor those who went before...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002370_GOSETSU<tab>Ce sera la plus belle offrande possible pour quelqu'un que la haine a consumé.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002380_GOSETSU<tab>And with that I take my leave!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002380_GOSETSU<tab>Sur ce, je prends congé de vous. Une longue route m'attend.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002390_THANCRED<tab>Oh dear. We seem to be missing a corpse.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002390_THANCRED<tab>J'y crois pas... Le cercueil est vide...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002400_ALISAIE<tab>Well it must be somewhere. I only hope it isn't walking around...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002400_ALISAIE<tab>Ça veut dire c'que j'pense...<var 1D /var>?
